column2: Job Profile  As a Tour Operator Sales and Business Development Manager focusing on the Kerala segment, your role is to drive sales growth and expand business opportunities specifically within the Kerala tourism market.  Role & responsibilities     Conduct thorough market research to identify trends and opportunities specific to the tour operator segment in Kerala, including analyzing competitor activities and customer preferences within the region Target and acquire new tour operator clients in Kerala, negotiating terms and agreements to establish mutually beneficial partnerships that align with the company's objectives. Ensure maximum representation of tour operators from Kerala in our Tour Operator Portal by appointing and registering them, thereby enhancing engagement and coverage within the region. Collaborate closely with the marketing team to develop promotional materials specifically tailored to the Kerala segment, highlighting the unique attractions and experiences offered in the region. Work towards achieving sales targets from tour operator segments across Kerala, leveraging effective sales strategies and relationship-building techniques. Actively participate in all travel fairs, exhibitions, and industry-related events relevant to Kerala tourism, conducting promotional activities and representing the company's offerings in the region. Develop innovative business initiatives to support the creation of new revenue streams and strategic customer development within Kerala tourism. Create and maintain a comprehensive database of prospective clients within the Kerala segment, utilizing CRM software to track and manage client information effectively. Maintain a detailed pipeline of all sales activities using CRM software, ensuring accurate tracking of sales progress and administration tasks related to the Kerala segment.
column11: CRM Management, Travel Sales, Corporate Business Development, Tour Packages, Tour Management

column2: Role & responsibilities   Operations, with 3 -10 Years Experience working in a reputed inbound travel Dept. with working knowledge of B2B operations/ booking systems, itinerary planning of European Holidays destinations, processing/overseeing bookings for all of Europe, Scandinavia, UK etc. having good communication skills preferably working with travel agents PAN India. Overseeing Operations, ensuring efficiency, managing a team, driving productivity, closure of files with profit generation as per company policy. Preferred candidate profile  Basic knowledge of the International Holiday Packages - Should be able to speak good English & Hindi - With an average knowledge of Outlook, MS. Word & Excel. - A Person should be self-drive and self-managed - Able to speak with clients to take their requirements. - Shift Timings 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM Perks and benefits  company norms
column11: Holiday Packages, Outbound Tours, Tour Packages, Tours, End To End, European, Scandinavia, Tourism, Leisure, Travel Sales, Uk, Itinerary, Travel Management, Hotel Booking
